name: Monolith
text: OMG! The monolith lives! And it's getting guarded.

name: Lighthouse
text: The north-west lighthouse is emitting some weird fog or something.

name: Away
text: It's probably a good idea to stay away from there.

name: Food?
text: I think the tower is hungry? like it needs food or something...

name: Discovery
text: Crazy discovery today. We found more of that voidsteel stuff.   It has a funny smell though.

name: To Jack
text: Jack if u find this, I went to the hole with other survivors please come find me ASAP! Love you! Anna

name: To Anna
text: Anna, I saw your note but on the way I got attacked by this weird looking thing. I am so sorry. Jack

name: From Anna
text: Hey Jack we are still inside the hole. I hope you are well. Please come and find me. I miss you! xx Anna

name: Sick Neighbour
text: One of the neighbours looked a bit sick today.   Hopefully he feels better tomorrow

name: Weird Noises
text: I heard some weird noises coming from our sick neighbours house. I don't think he will get better any time soon.

name: Attack
text: I saw our neighbour attack someone on the street today. 5 people were needed to stop him!
